Apple___Apple_scab.fertilizer: Use balanced NPK fertilizer; add compost.

remedy.dry: Maintain irrigation and prune infected leaves.
remedy.default: Remove fallen leaves and use resistant varieties.

why.en: Caused by fungi in warm, humid weather.
why.hi: गर्म, आर्द्र मौसम में फफूंद से होता है।

remedy.humid: Use fungicide sprays and remove mummified fruits.
remedy.dry: Irrigate consistently and prune infected twigs.
remedy.default: Maintain orchard sanitation and rotate crops.

why.en: Spreads from nearby cedar trees during wet spring.
why.hi: बरसात के मौसम में पास के देवदार पेड़ों से फैलता है।

remedy.default: Avoid planting apples near cedar trees.
